name: DoubleDome – WordCount Details Dashboard
author: DoubleDome Digital Marketing

sections.description:
Introducing DoubleDome – the WordCount Details Dashboard, a powerful WordPress plugin meticulously crafted to offer users a comprehensive understanding of their content’s word count details. With its user-friendly interface and an array of intuitive features, this plugin serves as an indispensable tool for bloggers, writers, and website owners, empowering them to effectively manage and optimize their content.

With DoubleDome, you gain access to a centralized dashboard that presents intricate word count statistics for each individual post, page, and custom post type. Seamlessly, you can monitor the number of words in your content, enabling you to assess your writing style, enhance your SEO strategies, and meet specific word count requirements effortlessly. Experience the true power of DoubleDome – WordCount Details Dashboard and take control of your content like never before.

Within DoubleDome’s comprehensive dashboard, users gain an invaluable overview of the website’s total word count, granting them a clear understanding of the content’s overall size and scope. Armed with this information, website owners can make well-informed decisions regarding content organization, formatting, and navigation.

One of DoubleDome’s standout features lies in its ability to meticulously break down word count details according to various criteria. Users have the flexibility to analyze word count statistics based on categories, tags, authors, and publishing dates. This exceptional capability empowers users to engage in targeted analysis and comparison, enabling them to identify emerging trends, track progress, and adjust content creation strategies accordingly.

In addition to its exceptional analytical capabilities, DoubleDome goes above and beyond by offering practical tools for efficient content management. Users have the ability to set personalized word count goals for their posts, ensuring they meet specific targets for each piece of content. With real-time tracking of progress towards these goals, DoubleDome serves as a constant motivator, encouraging users to consistently produce high-quality and well-structured content.

Designed with user-friendliness in mind, DoubleDome seamlessly integrates into the existing WordPress workflow. The plugin is fully compatible with the latest WordPress version, allowing for effortless installation and activation with just a few clicks. Once installed, it effortlessly integrates into the WordPress admin panel, providing users with quick and convenient access to all the necessary word count details and management features.

Unlock the power of DoubleDome and streamline your content management process like never before. With its intuitive tools and seamless integration, DoubleDome empowers you to achieve your content goals with ease and efficiency.

No matter if you’re a seasoned blogger, a content marketer, or an aspiring writer, DoubleDome – WordCount Details Dashboard is the perfect solution for you. This exceptional WordPress plugin offers a wide range of features, including comprehensive word count analytics, goal-setting capabilities, and a user-friendly interface. It is designed to empower users like you to optimize your content creation process and effortlessly achieve your writing objectives.

With DoubleDome by your side, you can dive into detailed word count analytics, gaining valuable insights into your writing patterns and progress. Set personalized goals for your content, and let the plugin track your progress in real-time, motivating you to stay on track and produce high-quality content consistently. The user-friendly interface ensures a seamless experience, allowing you to navigate through the plugin effortlessly and make the most out of its powerful features.

This simple plugin provides a separate dashboard view of the number of words throughout your WordPress website, broken down by pages, posts and even custom post types. It also shows an average and total word count view.

Features:

  1. Display total word count in all posts
  2. Display total word count in all pages
  3. Display total word count in all custom post types
  4. Display total number of posts, pages and custom post types
  5. Display average words in posts/pages/custom post type
  6. Plugin support via email

Support

Do you have questions or issues with DoubleDome – WordCount Details Dashboard Setup? Please send an email to pluginsupport@doubledome.com.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire doubledome-wordcount-details-dashboard folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
